paper_abstract: Purpose - The nonlinear jerk equation is a third-order nonlinear equation that describes some physical phenomena and in general form is given by: (x) triple over dot = J (x,(x) over dot, (x) triple over dot ). The purpose of this paper is to employ the modified (MDTM) differential transform method (DTM) to obtain approximate periodic solutions of two cases of nonlinear jerk equation. Design/methodology/approach - The approach is based on MDTM that is developed by combining DTM, Laplace transform and Pade approximant. Findings - Comparison of results obtained by MDTM with those obtained by numerical solutions indicates the excellent accuracy of solution. Originality/value - The MDTM is extended to determining approximate periodic solution of third-order nonlinear differential equations.
paper_title: Approximate periodic solution for nonlinear jerk equation as a third-order nonlinear equation via modified differential transform method
